org.cantaloupe.network.packet

Class PacketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.network.packet.PacketHandler

  • public class PacketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to handle packets.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens
